trans-unit.source: Provides design-time support for <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.SequenceActivity"></xref> and all classes that derive from it.

> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] SequenceDesigner provides design-time support for the following classes that derive from <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequenceActivity>: - <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> - <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseBranchActivity> - <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateFinalizationActivity> - <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> - <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TransactionScopeActivity> - <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.SynchronizationScopeActivity> - <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ReplicatorActivity>
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequenceDesigner"></xref> class.
